img_above_text:
![Woods Ember Walkthrough \(97\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/b/b5/Woods_Ember_Walkthrough_%2897%29.png)
Go back inside the cave and now turn right to collect the green Wisp. Take out the Revenant near it, then go forward.
img_below_text:
The path splits here, and you'll probably notice the green Wisp on the right first. On the left, you'll be able to see an enemy with a blue Spirit. You'll want to head for the green Wisp first. But before you go collect it, be prepared that there's a lot of the Revenant Charbones in this area and they'll all charge at you.
![Woods Ember Walkthrough \(99\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/a/a3/Woods_Ember_Walkthrough_%2899%29.png)

Go back inside the cave and now turn right to collect the green Wisp. Take out the Revenant near it, then go forward."
            - Following Text: "The path splits here, and you'll probably notice the green Wisp on the right first. On the left, you'll be able to see an enemy with a blue Spirit. You'll want to head for the green Wisp first. But before you go collect it, be prepared that there's a lot of the Revenant Charbones in this area and they'll all charge at you.
![Woods Ember Walkthrough \(99\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/a/a3/Woods_Ember_Walkthrough_%2899%29.png)"

img_summary: The image depicts a dark cave environment where the player character is facing a path split. Two Wisps are visible: a green Wisp on the right and a blue Spirit guarded by an enemy on the left. The preceding text instructs the player to collect the green Wisp and defeat the nearby Revenant, while the following text warns of multiple Revenant Charbones that will charge at the player when approaching the green Wisp. The image serves to visually guide the player through this specific section of the game, highlighting the location of the Wisps and the impending combat challenge.
